articles.title: Zombie Seizures: The Hacking of Twitter
articles.description: July 15, 2020.  It was a day that will be remembered in the history of social media giant, Twitter. In what is becoming an increasingly quotidian occurrence with such companies, Twitter faced a hack described as “catastrophic”.  The company’s own language was…
